summary: Add new follower name "Danika" to the game inspired by dremora of Morrowind
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][size=3]DANIKA THE DREMORA FOLLOWER

Add new follower name "Danika" to the game inspired by dremora of Morrowind of the third era.

Character Backstory:

Danika one of the dremora general fighting in the war of Oblivion Gate at the end of third era for her master
the daedric prince Mehrunes Dagon to conquer all of tamriel but fail. after the defeat of Mehrunes Dagon by Akatosh
the leader of the eight devine and send back to oblivion realm. Mehrunes dagon decide to keeping an eye to
mortal ream, and sending one of he's most strongest general Danika to guard one of his
shrine in skyrim and to serve a worthy Champion of Mehrunes Dagon.

Name : Danika

Weight : 100

Levels : 15

Combat style : Custom Two Handed

Class : Two Handed Warrior

Weapon : Daedric crescent (Unplayable)

[b]Location : [/b]
Danika can be found inside the Shrine Of Mehrunes Dagon

[b]Required : [/b]
Skyrim.esm

[b][u]> > Required for HDT< <[/u][/b]

Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)
http://skse.silverlock.org/

XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by [b]xp32[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800

HDT Physics Extensions by [b]HydrogensaysHDT[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996

Recommended :

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019

Credit :

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986

Battle Hardened Body Mod Vanilla UNP UNPB UNPC CBBE ADEC by [b]Wast1980[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32329
[/size][/font][/center][font=Times New Roman][size=3]
